# isCancelled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the request has been cancelled.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCancelled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the resource loader cancels the loading of a request, just prior to sending the message [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate/resourceLoader(_:didCancel:)-3nl51] to the delegate.

## Reporting the result of the request

- **response**: The URL response for the loading request.
- **finishLoading()**: Causes the receiver to treat the processing of the request as complete.
- **finishLoading(with:)**: Causes the receiver to handle the failure to load a resource for which a resource loader’s delegate took responsibility.
- **isFinished**: A Boolean value that indicates whether loading of the resource has finished.
- **finishLoading(with:data:redirect:)**: Causes the receiver to finish loading a resource for which a resource loader’s delegate took responsibility .
